task.title: Quick Apple Sweet Potato Hash
task.shortdesc: Simple, delicious, and easy to make!

ul.li: 2-3 large sweet potatoes, cut into uniform cubes
1-2 small apples (Fuji, Granny Smith, or Pink Lady)

step.cmd: Dice sweet potatoes into uniform cubes. Place into a glass bowl and microwave for 6-8 minutes.
Peel and chop apples while potatoes are cooking.
Preheat a large skillet over medium heat. Add coconut oil to the skillet.
Add the sweet potatoes and chopped apples to the skillet.
Chop sage and add to the skillet. Add salt and pepper.
Cook for 5-7 minutes over medium heat. Stir occasionally.
